name: Approval Request Assigned
description: Send a notification to a user indicating they have an approval request that they need to review.
subject: An Approval Request Is Awaiting Your Review
body:
Dear ${__recipient.name},

You have $__contentJson.batchSize approval #if($__contentJson.batchSize==1) request #else requests #end waiting for your review.

To review approval requests that are assigned to you, please go to: $__global.productUrl/ui/d/$approverPath


Thank you,
The ${__global.productName} Team
